item.description:
How does your birth order affect you whether first born, only, middle, last, or twin or other unique order? Learn about the exceptions to the rules. Learn how your unique order has affected your life and hear stories of other birth orders who attend.

7:00 pm - 9:30 pm

(Cost $40 - Sliding scale to $20)

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is a relationship and communication coach and therapist with 30 years experience. He teaches the Enneagram, Myers Briggs and other systems to help people understand and bridge differences. He also does phone consults, teaches and coaches in organizations to help people work together effectively and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram. Organize a group for your friends, family or associates.

781 648 3737
herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com
item.name: Birth Order - How it Affects You
